select prm.id, prm.title, prm.type, prm.dept, prm.issuing_time, prm.url, sdd.dict_label as typeName from policies_regulations_management AS prm left join sys_dict_data AS sdd on prm.type = sdd.dict_value
prm.del_flag = 0
and prm.type = #{dto.type}
and prm.title like concat('%',#{dto.title},'%')
order by prm.issuing_time desc
